hero.name: I am Yatharth
hero.subtitle: Innovating AI for smarter solutions and scalable systems.

about.title: About Me
about.primary: I'm a passionate software engineer and machine learning enthusiast, focused on building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.
about.secondary: With a background in computer science and years of industry experience, I blend technical expertise with creative problem-solving to deliver innovative solutions.

projects.title: Image Inpainting
projects.description: Harnessing segmentation-aware partial convolutions for ultra-precise image reconstruction.

projects.title: Inpersona
projects.description: AI-powered avatar, to inpersonate as if you are talking to me in person.

projects.title: Sprechen
projects.description: Implementing Transformer-based architecture to convert text between languages with precision.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to discuss potential opportunities? I'd love to hear from you!

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.description: A comprehensive toolkit of programming languages and technologies

items.title: SIH 2022 Grand Finale Winner
items.description: Led the creation of a no-code chatbot-building platform at the SIH hackathon, competing among thousands of teams. Enhanced chatbot narrative understanding with AWS ECS, implemented Amazon S3 for conversational storage.

items.title: 4th Rank in India Academia Connect AI Hackathon
items.description: Created AI solutions for COVID-19 distancing, using YOLO for crowd monitoring and heat maps for sanitation planning.

items.title: 87th Rank in Amazon ML Challenge
items.description: Ranked 87th among 10,000+ in Amazon's ML Challenge by building a product categorization model using TF-IDF.
